name: Chaos Chamber (tosch29)
description:
Game made in 48 hours during the GMTK Game Jam. 

Survive as long as possible in this room of chaos where every few seconds new event will be chosen from 25+ random  entries. (Yeah, and we have meteorites)

You can become unstoppable force killing every single enemy within seconds, or you will be obliterated within a minute. It's out of control...
